Summary: TS_TA_252_Verify user can login to BZMS portal
Description:
Verify user can login to BZMS portal

Pre-requisite: Foreign Trader has valid credentials
Exepected Result: User successfully logs into BZMS portal

Summary: TS_TA_253_Verify user can navigate to Authorization Request form
Description:
Verify user can navigate to Authorization Request form

Pre-requisite: User logged into BZMS portal
Exepected Result: Authorization Request form displayed

Summary: TS_TA_254_Verify user can select active zone profile and components
Description:
Verify user can select active zone profile and components

Pre-requisite: Active Zone Profiles available
Exepected Result: Selected zones/components accepted

Summary: TS_TA_255_Verify error when user submits request without selecting any zone/component
Description:
Verify error when user submits request without selecting any zone/component

Pre-requisite: Authorization Request form open
Exepected Result: Error displayed: "Please select at least one zone or component"

Summary: TS_TA_256_Verify Authorization Request is routed to BZ Operator after submission
Description:
Verify Authorization Request is routed to BZ Operator after submission

Pre-requisite: Request submitted
Exepected Result: Request status set to "Submitted" and routed to BZ Operator

Summary: TS_TA_257_Verify BZ Operator can approve Authorization Request
Description:
Verify BZ Operator can approve Authorization Request

Pre-requisite: Request received by BZ Operator
Action: Log in as BZ Operator and approve request
Exepected Result: Request status updated to "Approved by BZ Operator" and routed to Registration Officer

Summary: TS_TA_258_Verify BZ Operator can reject Authorization Request
Description:
Verify BZ Operator can reject Authorization Request

Pre-requisite: Request received by BZ Operator
Action: Log in as BZ Operator and reject request
Data: Request ID XYZ, Reason for rejection
Exepected Result: Request status updated to "Rejected" with reason; notification sent to Foreign Trader

Summary: TS_TA_259_Verify BZ Operator can request more information
Description:
Verify BZ Operator can request more information

Pre-requisite: Request received by BZ Operator
Action: Mark request as "Pending - More Information Required"
Exepected Result: Request status updated and notification sent to Foreign Trader with required details

Summary: TS_TA_260_Verify Foreign Trader can resubmit Authorization Request after info request
Description:
Verify Foreign Trader can resubmit Authorization Request after info request

Pre-requisite: Request status "Pending - More Information Required"
Exepected Result: Request resubmitted and routed again to BZ Operator

Summary: TS_TA_261_Verify Foreign Trader receives submission acknowledgment notification
Description:
Verify Foreign Trader receives submission acknowledgment notification

Pre-requisite: Authorization Request submitted
Exepected Result: Foreign Trader receives email/SMS/in-app notification with Request-ID

Summary: TS_TA_262_Verify BZ Operator receives new Authorization Request notification
Description:
Verify BZ Operator receives new Authorization Request notification

Pre-requisite: Authorization Request submitted
Exepected Result: BZ Operator receives notification of new request

Summary: TS_TA_263_Verify Foreign Trader receives notification of BZ Operator approval
Description:
Verify Foreign Trader receives notification of BZ Operator approval

Pre-requisite: Request approved by BZ Operator
Exepected Result: Foreign Trader notified of approval and request under Registration Officer review

Summary: TS_TA_264_Verify only active Zone Profiles/components are selectable
Description:
Verify only active Zone Profiles/components are selectable

Pre-requisite: System has active/inactive zones
Action: Attempt to select inactive Zone Profile
Exepected Result: Inactive zones/components cannot be selected

Summary: TS_TA_265_Verify Trader authorization only allows permitted actions on approved zones
Description:
Verify Trader authorization only allows permitted actions on approved zones

Pre-requisite: Authorization granted
Action: Perform entry/exit ticket actions on approved zone
Exepected Result: Actions succeed only on authorized zones/components

Summary: TS_TA_266_Verify system suspends authorization if zone/component becomes frozen
Description:
Verify system suspends authorization if zone/component becomes frozen

Pre-requisite: Zone becomes frozen
Exepected Result: Authorization suspended after current transactions complete; actions blocked

Summary: TS_TA_267_Verify all authorization requests and decisions are logged
Description:
Verify all authorization requests and decisions are logged

Pre-requisite: Requests submitted and processed
Exepected Result: Audit trail records user ID, timestamps, status, and comments

Summary: TS_TA_268_Verify error when submitting request with special characters in description
Description:
Verify error when submitting request with special characters in description

Pre-requisite: Authorization Request form open
Action: Enter special characters in description and submit
Exepected Result: Error displayed: "Invalid characters in description"

Summary: TS_TA_269_Verify PEGA workflow routes request correctly from BZ Operator to Registration Officer
Description:
Verify PEGA workflow routes request correctly from BZ Operator to Registration Officer

Pre-requisite: Request approved by BZ Operator
Exepected Result: Request routed to Registration Officer in PEGA workflow

Summary: TS_TA_270_Verify audit trail entries are correctly logged in PEGA backend
Description:
Verify audit trail entries are correctly logged in PEGA backend

Pre-requisite: Authorization Request submitted and processed
Action: Submit and process request; check audit logs
Exepected Result: Audit trail contains correct timestamps, user IDs, and status updates

Summary: TS_TA_271_Verify BZ Operator receives in‑app, email and SMS notifications for a new Authorization Amendment request
Description:
Verify BZ Operator receives in‑app, email and SMS notifications for a new Authorization Amendment request

Pre-requisite: New Authorization Amendment request created
Action: Trigger amendment request and observe notifications
Exepected Result: BZ Operator receives notification via all configured channels (in‑app, email, SMS)

Summary: TS_TA_272_Verify system prevents creation of a new account when the user already has a valid license and an active account
Description:
Verify system prevents creation of a new account when the user already has a valid license and an active account

Pre-requisite: User with existing valid license logged in
Action: Attempt to create a new account for same user
Exepected Result: System blocks creation and shows error “Account already exists”

Summary: TS_TA_273_Verify delete option is available for a tenant in the amendment user story
Description:
Verify delete option is available for a tenant in the amendment user story

Pre-requisite: Existing tenant present in system
Action: Open tenant amendment screen and select “Delete”
Exepected Result: Delete option is displayed and can be executed (soft delete)

Summary: TS_TA_274_Verify logical deletion (freeze) of a tenant retains audit‑trail information
Description:
Verify logical deletion (freeze) of a tenant retains audit‑trail information

Pre-requisite: Tenant to be removed
Exepected Result: Tenant marked as deleted but audit trail remains intact, fulfilling audit‑trail requirement

Summary: TS_TA_275_Verify system handles attempt to delete a non‑existent tenant gracefully
Description:
Verify system handles attempt to delete a non‑existent tenant gracefully

Pre-requisite: No tenant with given ID exists
Exepected Result: System returns “Tenant not found” error; no deletion occurs

Summary: TS_TA_276_Verify PEGA workflow routing uses CIAM for authentication and integrates with customs/tax systems as required
Description:
Verify PEGA workflow routing uses CIAM for authentication and integrates with customs/tax systems as required

Pre-requisite: User authenticated via CIAM (2‑factor)
Action: Initiate routing in PEGA and check external service calls
Exepected Result: Routing succeeds with CIAM auth; calls to customs/tax integrations are logged

Summary: TS_TA_277_Verify user can login to BZMS portal
Description:
Verify user can login to BZMS portal

Pre-requisite: Registered Foreign Trader has valid credentials
Exepected Result: User successfully logs into BZMS portal

Summary: TS_TA_278_Verify user navigates to Authorization Amendment Request page
Description:
Verify user navigates to Authorization Amendment Request page

Pre-requisite: User logged in
Action: Navigate to Authorization Amendment request form
Exepected Result: Authorization Amendment Request form displayed

Summary: TS_TA_279_Verify user can view current authorized Zone Profiles and components
Description:
Verify user can view current authorized Zone Profiles and components

Pre-requisite: User has authorized zones/components
Exepected Result: List of current authorizations displayed correctly

Summary: TS_TA_280_Verify user can select zone profiles/components to add
Description:
Verify user can select zone profiles/components to add

Pre-requisite: Authorization Amendment form open
Exepected Result: Selected zones/components accepted

Summary: TS_TA_281_Verify user can select zone profiles/components to remove
Description:
Verify user can select zone profiles/components to remove

Pre-requisite: Authorization Amendment form open
Exepected Result: Selected zones/components accepted

Summary: TS_TA_282_Verify error shown if no zones/components selected during amendment submission
Description:
Verify error shown if no zones/components selected during amendment submission

Pre-requisite: Authorization Amendment form open
Exepected Result: Error message: "Please select at least one zone or component to add or remove"

Summary: TS_TA_283_Verify successful submission of Authorization Amendment request
Description:
Verify successful submission of Authorization Amendment request

Pre-requisite: Valid form filled
Exepected Result: Request status set to "Submitted" and routed to BZ Operator

Summary: TS_TA_284_Verify BZ Operator can approve Authorization Amendment request
Description:
Verify BZ Operator can approve Authorization Amendment request

Pre-requisite: Amendment request pending for BZ Operator
Action: Log in as BZ Operator and approve request
Exepected Result: Request status updated to "Approved by BZ Operator" and routed to BZ Registration Officer

Summary: TS_TA_285_Verify BZ Operator can reject Authorization Amendment request
Description:
Verify BZ Operator can reject Authorization Amendment request

Pre-requisite: Amendment request pending for BZ Operator
Action: Log in as BZ Operator and reject request
Exepected Result: Request status updated to "Rejected" with rejection reason; notification sent to Foreign Trader

Summary: TS_TA_286_Verify BZ Operator can mark Authorization Amendment request as “More Info”
Description:
Verify BZ Operator can mark Authorization Amendment request as “More Info”

Pre-requisite: Amendment request pending for BZ Operator
Action: Mark request as "Pending - More Information Required"
Exepected Result: Request status updated; notification sent to Foreign Trader detailing needed information

Summary: TS_TA_287_Verify Foreign Trader can resubmit Authorization Amendment after info request
Description:
Verify Foreign Trader can resubmit Authorization Amendment after info request

Pre-requisite: Request status "Pending – More Information Required"
Exepected Result: Request resubmitted and routed to BZ Operator

Summary: TS_TA_288_Verify Foreign Trader receives acknowledgment notification on submission
Description:
Verify Foreign Trader receives acknowledgment notification on submission

Pre-requisite: Amendment request submitted
Exepected Result: Foreign Trader receives notification with Request ID

Summary: TS_TA_289_Verify BZ Operator receives notification of new Authorization Amendment request
Description:
Verify BZ Operator receives notification of new Authorization Amendment request

Pre-requisite: Amendment request submitted
Exepected Result: BZ Operator receives notification of new amendment request

Summary: TS_TA_290_Verify Foreign Trader receives notification when BZ Operator approves request
Description:
Verify Foreign Trader receives notification when BZ Operator approves request

Pre-requisite: Amendment approved by BZ Operator
Action: Approve Authorization Amendment request as BZ Operator
Exepected Result: Foreign Trader notified that request is under review by BZ Registration Officer

Summary: TS_TA_291_Verify inactive Zone Profiles/components cannot be selected for addition
Description:
Verify inactive Zone Profiles/components cannot be selected for addition

Pre-requisite: System has inactive zones/components
Exepected Result: Inactive zones/components are disabled or not selectable

Summary: TS_TA_292_Verify approved amendment updates authorization for permitted actions
Description:
Verify approved amendment updates authorization for permitted actions

Pre-requisite: Amendment approved
Action: Perform authorized actions on updated zones/components
Exepected Result: User can perform permitted actions only on updated authorized zones/components

Summary: TS_TA_293_Verify access revoked for frozen zones/components after active transactions end
Description:
Verify access revoked for frozen zones/components after active transactions end

Pre-requisite: Zone/component frozen
Action: User tries to access frozen zone/component
Exepected Result: User access revoked after active operations are closed

Summary: TS_TA_294_Verify all amendments are logged with timestamp, submitter, and status
Description:
Verify all amendments are logged with timestamp, submitter, and status

Pre-requisite: Amendments submitted and processed
Exepected Result: Audit logs contain timestamps, submitter info, and approval status

Summary: TS_TA_295_Verify Shipping Agent can submit amendment requests like Foreign Trader
Description:
Verify Shipping Agent can submit amendment requests like Foreign Trader

Pre-requisite: Registered Shipping Agent with authorization
Exepected Result: Amendment request processed as Trader; normal flow applies

Summary: TS_TA_296_Verify notification sent to submitter and users with dependencies on frozen auth
Description:
Verify notification sent to submitter and users with dependencies on frozen auth

Pre-requisite: Frozen Authorization approved
Exepected Result: Submitter and users with dependencies receive notification of freezing

Summary: TS_TA_297_Verify error when submitting amendment with special characters in description
Description:
Verify error when submitting amendment with special characters in description

Pre-requisite: Authorization Amendment form open
Action: Enter special characters in description and submit
Exepected Result: Error message: "Invalid characters in description field"

Summary: TS_TA_298_Verify system prevents amendment for zone/component already pending in another request
Description:
Verify system prevents amendment for zone/component already pending in another request

Pre-requisite: Pending amendment request exists for same zone/component
Action: Submit new amendment request for same zone/component
Data: Zone Profile A (already in pending request)
Exepected Result: Error message: "Amendment already pending for selected zone/component"

Summary: TS_TA_299_Verify error when attempting to remove all authorized zones/components without de-authorizing
Description:
Verify error when attempting to remove all authorized zones/components without de-authorizing

Pre-requisite: User has multiple authorized zones/components
Action: Select all zones/components for removal and submit
Data: All authorized zones/components selected for removal
Exepected Result: Error message: "At least one authorized zone/component must remain active"

Summary: TS_TA_300_Verify error when submitting amendment with no existing authorized zones/components
Description:
Verify error when submitting amendment with no existing authorized zones/components

Pre-requisite: User has no authorized zones/components
Action: Attempt to open amendment form and submit
Exepected Result: Error message: "No authorized zones/components available for amendment"

Summary: TS_TA_301_Verify PEGA workflow routes amendment request correctly from BZ Operator to Registration Officer
Description:
Verify PEGA workflow routes amendment request correctly from BZ Operator to Registration Officer

Pre-requisite: Amendment request submitted and approved by BZ Operator
Action: Track routing path in PEGA backend
Exepected Result: Request routed to BZ Registration Officer as per workflow

Summary: TS_TA_302_Verify audit trail entries are correctly logged in PEGA backend for amendment request
Description:
Verify audit trail entries are correctly logged in PEGA backend for amendment request

Pre-requisite: Amendment request submitted and processed
Action: Check audit logs in PEGA backend
Exepected Result: Audit log contains timestamp, submitter ID, action taken, and status
